title: 4 Ways to Check Air India Flight Status (Pooja Shree)
text: By Pooja Shree Jul 23, 2015 Air India, the national carrier of India, is also one of the leading full-service providers in the country. Being a Star Alliance member and having codeshare partnerships with other carriers, this airline serves almost all the major cities in the world. Hence, it is preferred by many travellers, and for their convenience, Air India announces its schedule in advance. However, there are chances that flights are not operated on their scheduled time due to various reasons. These could be technical, operational as well as natural. For passengers and their loved ones, delays or rescheduling could mean waiting for long hours at the airports. In order to minimise the inconvenience, current Air India flight status can be tracked by providing the flight number and date of travel as input.The flight status information tells people whether the flight is on-time or it will be delayed and if so, by how many hours. In the absence of this information, people would flock at the airports at scheduled arrival or departure times and might have to wait for long hours in case flight is not operating on time. This usually happens in the rainy and winter seasons as thunder striking and fog make it tough for airline to operate flights. Hence, current status is most sought after in these seasons. This is the reason that carriers offer different services that can be used by travellers. Here is a list of four ways to check Air India flight status. Make a Phone Call People can simply call on the toll free numbers provided by Air India to know the flight status. However, in the times of major disruptions, there are chances of calls being put in long queues before these are finally answered due to network congestion. Check It on the Website Website of Air India also provides flight status information. Travellers can easily access these details from their homes, offices and even when they are on move. Generally, it is updated on a regular basis and the information available here are the latest. Set Up Alerts Certain third-party applications can be subscribed to set up alerts in case there is some change in the scheduled itinerary of flights. These alerts can be received on mobile through SMS or via email. However, it needs to be checked whether these travel portals or applications have agreements with Air India for providing this facility to the passengers. Air India Mobile Application Air India mobile application can be downloaded and used for searching and booking flight tickets as well as for tracking status and other information. Travellers can also check the Air India ticket booking offers and deals by using this app on their smartphones. The airline also rolls out special schemes for the app users that are not applicable on any other booking mode. About the Author Online methods, whether using desktop or mobile, are the most convenient ones in searching and booking air tickets. Hence, travellers are suggested to make Air India ticket booking . In fact, the number of people using mobile-based applications for this purpose may soon surpass the number of desktop users. Rating:
